TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMemoryOwner`1<T> implements class System.IDisposable
Public Interface IMemoryOwner(Of T) Implements IDisposable
generic <typename T> public interface class IMemoryOwner : IDisposable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 儲存在記憶體中的項目類型。

span.span: The type of elements to store in memory.

summary.span: 識別記憶體區塊的擁有者，該擁有者負責妥善地處置基礎記憶體。

span.span: Identifies the owner of a block of memory who is responsible for disposing of the underlying memory appropriately.

remarks.format: `IMemoryOwner`介面用來定義擁有者負責的存留期管理緩衝區。The `IMemoryOwner` interface is used to define the owner responsible for the lifetime management of a buffer. 執行個體`IMemoryOwner`介面由方法。An instance of the `IMemoryOwner` interface is returned by the method. 雖然緩衝區可以有多個取用者，它只能有單一的擁有者在任何指定時間。While a buffer can have multiple consumers, it can only have a single owner at any given time. 擁有者可以：The owner can: - 直接或透過呼叫 factory 方法，請建立緩衝區。Create the buffer either directly or by calling a factory method. - 擁有權轉移給另一個取用者。Transfer ownership to another consumer. 在此情況下，先前的擁有者不應該再使用緩衝區。In this case, the previous owner should no longer use the buffer. - 當不再使用時，終結緩衝區。Destroy the buffer when it is no longer in use. 因為`IMemoryOwner`物件會實作介面，您應該呼叫其方法不再需要的記憶體緩衝區，並已被終結時，才可以。Because the `IMemoryOwner` object implements the interface, you should call its method only after the memory buffer is no longer needed and you have destroyed it. 您應該*未*處置`IMemoryOnwer`物件的參考它的記憶體可供使用時。You should *not* dispose of the `IMemoryOnwer` object while a reference to its memory is available. 這表示，在其中的類型`IMemoryOwner`宣告不應該有方法。This means that the type in which `IMemoryOwner` is declared should not have a method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Memory As Memory(Of T)
public: property Memory<T> Memory { Memory<T> get(); };

summary.span: 取得屬於此擁有者的記憶體。

span.span: Gets the memory belonging to this owner.

value.span: 屬於此擁有者的記憶體。

span.span: The memory belonging to this owner.
